texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 2022 Rules Changes
texts.text: 2022 Rules Changes

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Rule-Section-Article
texts.text: Rule-Section-Article

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Makes permanent the free kick formation change implemented during the 2021 season.
texts.text: Makes permanent the free kick formation change implemented during the 2021 season.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Modified overtime in postseason games to require that each team has the opportunity to possess the ball.
texts.text: Modified overtime in postseason games to require that each team has the opportunity to possess the ball.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: PREFACE
texts.text: PREFACE

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This edition of the Official Playing Rules of the  National Football League  contains all current rules governing the playing of professional football that are in effect for the 2022 NFL season. Member clubs of the League may amend the rules from time to time, pursuant to the applicable voting procedures of the NFL Constitution and Bylaws.
texts.text: This edition of the Official Playing Rules of the  National Football League  contains all current rules governing the playing of professional football that are in effect for the 2022 NFL season. Member clubs of the League may amend the rules from time to time, pursuant to the applicable voting procedures of the NFL Constitution and Bylaws.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Any intra-League dispute or call for interpretation in connection with these rules will be decided by the Commissioner of the League, whose ruling will be final.
texts.text: Any intra-League dispute or call for interpretation in connection with these rules will be decided by the Commissioner of the League, whose ruling will be final.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Because inter-conference games are played throughout the preseason, regular season, and postseason in  the  NFL, all  rules contained in  this  book apply uniformly to both the American and National Football Conferences.
texts.text: Because inter-conference games are played throughout the preseason, regular season, and postseason in  the  NFL, all  rules contained in  this  book apply uniformly to both the American and National Football Conferences.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Where the word 'illegal' appears in this rule book, it is an institutional term of art pertaining strictly to actions that violate NFL playing rules. It is not meant to connote illegality under any public law or the rules or regulations of any other organization.
texts.text: Where the word 'illegal' appears in this rule book, it is an institutional term of art pertaining strictly to actions that violate NFL playing rules. It is not meant to connote illegality under any public law or the rules or regulations of any other organization.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The word 'flagrant,' when used here to describe an action by a player, is meant to indicate that the degree of a violation of the rules-usually a personal foul or  unnecessary roughness-is extremely objectionable, conspicuous, unnecessary, avoidable, or gratuitous. 'Flagrant' in these rules does not necessarily imply malice on the part of the fouling player or an intention to injure an opponent.
texts.text: The word 'flagrant,' when used here to describe an action by a player, is meant to indicate that the degree of a violation of the rules-usually a personal foul or  unnecessary roughness-is extremely objectionable, conspicuous, unnecessary, avoidable, or gratuitous. 'Flagrant' in these rules does not necessarily imply malice on the part of the fouling player or an intention to injure an opponent.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Not reviewable. A's ball first-and-10 on B38. Replay cannot review how many players were in the offensive huddle if officials do not rule a dead-ball foul for too many players.
texts.text: Ruling: Not reviewable. A's ball first-and-10 on B38. Replay cannot review how many players were in the offensive huddle if officials do not rule a dead-ball foul for too many players.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.251 Intentional grounding, pass ruled short of line of scrimmage
texts.text: A.R. 15.251 Intentional grounding, pass ruled short of line of scrimmage

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Third-and-10 on A8. QBA1 rolls out of the pocket to avoid a sack and throws the ball from the end zone to the A10 with no eligible receivers in the area. The Line Judge rules that the ball did not make it back to the line of scrimmage and the Referee throws his flag for intentional grounding.
texts.text: Third-and-10 on A8. QBA1 rolls out of the pocket to avoid a sack and throws the ball from the end zone to the A10 with no eligible receivers in the area. The Line Judge rules that the ball did not make it back to the line of scrimmage and the Referee throws his flag for intentional grounding.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Not reviewable. Safety, SK A20.
texts.text: Ruling: Not reviewable. Safety, SK A20.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.252 Ineligible players downfield
texts.text: A.R. 15.252 Ineligible players downfield

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on B20. Back A1 catches a screen pass and runs for a touchdown. Replays show Guard A2 moving downfield at the B15-yard line before the pass.
texts.text: First-and-10 on B20. Back A1 catches a screen pass and runs for a touchdown. Replays show Guard A2 moving downfield at the B15-yard line before the pass.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Not reviewable. Touchdown stands.
texts.text: Ruling: Not reviewable. Touchdown stands.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.253 Palpably unfair act
texts.text: A.R. 15.253 Palpably unfair act

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Third-and-5 on B17. B1 intercepts a pass and is returning it down the sideline. B12 comes off the bench and makes a block that allows B1 to run for a score.
texts.text: Third-and-5 on B17. B1 intercepts a pass and is returning it down the sideline. B12 comes off the bench and makes a block that allows B1 to run for a score.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Not reviewable. A palpably unfair act is not a reviewable infraction. Whether a player was on the field at the snap is reviewable and can create or remove a foul for illegal substitution.
texts.text: Ruling: Not reviewable. A palpably unfair act is not a reviewable infraction. Whether a player was on the field at the snap is reviewable and can create or remove a foul for illegal substitution.

texts.text: A.R. 15.254 Play ruled score

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on B12. With 4:02 remaining in the second quarter, QBA1's pass to A80 is ruled complete in the end zone for a TD. Replays show the ball hit the ground before A80 possessed it.
texts.text: First-and-10 on B12. With 4:02 remaining in the second quarter, QBA1's pass to A80 is ruled complete in the end zone for a TD. Replays show the ball hit the ground before A80 possessed it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. Incomplete pass, A's ball second-and-10 on B12. Reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play since the ruling on the field resulted in a score.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. Incomplete pass, A's ball second-and-10 on B12. Reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play since the ruling on the field resulted in a score.

texts.text: A.R. 15.255 Play ruled turnover

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on A30. With 10:00 remaining in the second quarter, QBA1's pass is ruled intercepted by B3 at the A45. Replays show the ball hit the ground before B3 possessed it.
texts.text: First-and-10 on A30. With 10:00 remaining in the second quarter, QBA1's pass is ruled intercepted by B3 at the A45. Replays show the ball hit the ground before B3 possessed it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. Incomplete pass, A's ball second-and-10 on A30. Reset the game clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play since the ruling on the field resulted in an interception.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. Incomplete pass, A's ball second-and-10 on A30. Reset the game clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play since the ruling on the field resulted in an interception.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.256 Multiple aspects to review
texts.text: A.R. 15.256 Multiple aspects to review

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on A30. With 10:00 remaining in the second quarter, back A2 fumbles at the A45 and it is returned by B4 to the A5. Replays show that after recovering the fumble, B4 was down by contact at the A45.
texts.text: First-and-10 on A30. With 10:00 remaining in the second quarter, back A2 fumbles at the A45 and it is returned by B4 to the A5. Replays show that after recovering the fumble, B4 was down by contact at the A45.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. B's ball first-and-10 on A45, reset the clock to the time when B4 was down by contact. The ruling on the field was a fumble recovered by the defense. Although that is not in question, only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play. Once the review is initiated, replay will look at all reviewable aspects of the play.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. B's ball first-and-10 on A45, reset the clock to the time when B4 was down by contact. The ruling on the field was a fumble recovered by the defense. Although that is not in question, only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play. Once the review is initiated, replay will look at all reviewable aspects of the play.

texts.text: Third-and-goal on B4. In the third quarter, back A2 takes a handoff and runs to the goal line where he is hit and driven backward.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The officials spot the ball short of the goal line and make it fourth down. Replays show the ball broke the plane of the goal line.
texts.text: The officials spot the ball short of the goal line and make it fourth down. Replays show the ball broke the plane of the goal line.

texts.text: Ruling:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Reviewable. Touchdown, KO A35, reset the clock to the time of the touchdown. Since the ruling on the field did not result in points for either team, the Team A coach must challenge the ruling outside two minutes of either half.
texts.text: Reviewable. Touchdown, KO A35, reset the clock to the time of the touchdown. Since the ruling on the field did not result in points for either team, the Team A coach must challenge the ruling outside two minutes of either half.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.258 Foul negates score
texts.text: A.R. 15.258 Foul negates score

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Fourth-and-goal on B8. With 3:43 remaining in the fourth quarter, QBA1's pass to A8 is ruled complete in the end zone, but A7 is penalized for offensive holding. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before A8 possessed it.
texts.text: Fourth-and-goal on B8. With 3:43 remaining in the fourth quarter, QBA1's pass to A8 is ruled complete in the end zone, but A7 is penalized for offensive holding. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before A8 possessed it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. Incomplete pass, B's ball first-and-10 on B8, decline holding foul. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play since the ruling on the field was a touchdown nullified by a penalty.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. Incomplete pass, B's ball first-and-10 on B8, decline holding foul. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play since the ruling on the field was a touchdown nullified by a penalty.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.259 Play not ruled turnover
texts.text: A.R. 15.259 Play not ruled turnover

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Fourth-and-10 on A30. With 10:00 remaining in the second quarter, Team A's punt grazes the left leg of B19 and is then recovered by A44 at the B30. The officials rule that B19 did not touch the ball and award possession to B.
texts.text: Fourth-and-10 on A30. With 10:00 remaining in the second quarter, Team A's punt grazes the left leg of B19 and is then recovered by A44 at the B30. The officials rule that B19 did not touch the ball and award possession to B.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball first-and-10 on B30. The ruling on the field was that the scrimmage kick was not touched by B, so the Team A coach must challenge outside two minutes.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball first-and-10 on B30. The ruling on the field was that the scrimmage kick was not touched by B, so the Team A coach must challenge outside two minutes.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.260 Line to gain on fourth down
texts.text: A.R. 15.260 Line to gain on fourth down

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Fourth-and-2 on B41. With 3:43 remaining in the fourth quarter, back A2 takes a handoff and runs to the B39 where he is hit and driven backward. The officials spot the ball at the B39½ and award possession to Team B.
texts.text: Fourth-and-2 on B41. With 3:43 remaining in the fourth quarter, back A2 takes a handoff and runs to the B39 where he is hit and driven backward. The officials spot the ball at the B39½ and award possession to Team B.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball first-and-10 on B39, and wind on the ready. Team A coach must challenge this play outside two minutes of either half. Replay Official is not responsible for initiating a review for a turnover on downs for plays that start before the two-minute warning.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball first-and-10 on B39, and wind on the ready. Team A coach must challenge this play outside two minutes of either half. Replay Official is not responsible for initiating a review for a turnover on downs for plays that start before the two-minute warning.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.261 Onside kick
texts.text: A.R. 15.261 Onside kick

texts.label: text
texts.orig: With 2:40 remaining in the fourth quarter, Team A attempts an onside kick from the A35. A19 is the first to touch the ball at the A44 and then recovers it at the A46. The officials award possession to Team A.
texts.text: With 2:40 remaining in the fourth quarter, Team A attempts an onside kick from the A35. A19 is the first to touch the ball at the A44 and then recovers it at the A46. The officials award possession to Team A.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. B's ball first-and-10 on A44. ITK. Team B's coach must challenge this play outside two minutes of either half. The Replay Official is not responsible for initiating a review during a free kick before the two-minute warning, but is responsible for challenging the play if there is a turnover or score during a subsequent run.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. B's ball first-and-10 on A44. ITK. Team B's coach must challenge this play outside two minutes of either half. The Replay Official is not responsible for initiating a review during a free kick before the two-minute warning, but is responsible for challenging the play if there is a turnover or score during a subsequent run.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: TIMING OF CHALLENGE
texts.text: TIMING OF CHALLENGE

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.262 Double Challenge
texts.text: A.R. 15.262 Double Challenge

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Second-and-10 on B35. With 12:00 remaining in the fourth quarter, QBA1 rolls out and throws a pass to A2 at the back of the end zone that is ruled incomplete. Team A challenges that the pass was complete, but replays show that A2 only got one foot down inbounds and the call on the field is upheld. While the Referee is making his announcement, a new replay comes up that shows the QB stepping on the sideline at the B40 before releasing the pass. Team B challenges the play.
texts.text: Second-and-10 on B35. With 12:00 remaining in the fourth quarter, QBA1 rolls out and throws a pass to A2 at the back of the end zone that is ruled incomplete. Team A challenges that the pass was complete, but replays show that A2 only got one foot down inbounds and the call on the field is upheld. While the Referee is making his announcement, a new replay comes up that shows the QB stepping on the sideline at the B40 before releasing the pass. Team B challenges the play.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. Both teams can challenge the same play. A's ball third-and-15 on the B40, reset the clock to the time when the QB stepped out of bounds, and start on the snap. A team cannot challenge the same play twice. It is important that all reviewable aspects of a play are confirmed by replay regardless of what is being challenged. Team A is charged with a challenge and a timeout.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. Both teams can challenge the same play. A's ball third-and-15 on the B40, reset the clock to the time when the QB stepped out of bounds, and start on the snap. A team cannot challenge the same play twice. It is important that all reviewable aspects of a play are confirmed by replay regardless of what is being challenged. Team A is charged with a challenge and a timeout.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.263 Next legal snap
texts.text: A.R. 15.263 Next legal snap

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on A20. In the third quarter, A2 catches a pass at the A45. Before the next snap, Tackle A5 false starts. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before A2 caught it.
texts.text: First-and-10 on A20. In the third quarter, A2 catches a pass at the A45. Before the next snap, Tackle A5 false starts. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before A2 caught it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. Play can be reviewed up until the next legal snap. Incomplete pass, A's ball second-and 10 on A20, reset the clock to the time the ball hit the ground, and the penalty for false start is ignored. Only Team B can challenge the ruling in this situation since it did not commit the foul that prevented the next snap.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. Play can be reviewed up until the next legal snap. Incomplete pass, A's ball second-and 10 on A20, reset the clock to the time the ball hit the ground, and the penalty for false start is ignored. Only Team B can challenge the ruling in this situation since it did not commit the foul that prevented the next snap.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on B15. At the start of the play there is 2:02 remaining in the second quarter. A2 catches a pass in the end zone that is ruled a TD with 1:53 left on the clock. Team A then attempts a two-point conversion and QBA1 is ruled down short of the goal line. Replays show that the ball broke the plane before he was down.
texts.text: First-and-10 on B15. At the start of the play there is 2:02 remaining in the second quarter. A2 catches a pass in the end zone that is ruled a TD with 1:53 left on the clock. Team A then attempts a two-point conversion and QBA1 is ruled down short of the goal line. Replays show that the ball broke the plane before he was down.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable, two-point conversion is good, KO A35. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of a Try, whether successful or unsuccessful.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable, two-point conversion is good, KO A35. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of a Try, whether successful or unsuccessful.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.265 Double foul that prevents the snap
texts.text: A.R. 15.265 Double foul that prevents the snap

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on B30. A pass to A2 is ruled incomplete near the goal line. Before the next legal snap, A5 commits a false start and B1 commits a personal foul when he forcibly shoves A5 to the ground. Replays show that A2 caught the pass.
texts.text: First-and-10 on B30. A pass to A2 is ruled incomplete near the goal line. Before the next legal snap, A5 commits a false start and B1 commits a personal foul when he forcibly shoves A5 to the ground. Replays show that A2 caught the pass.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: The ruling of incomplete pass is not reviewable. A's ball, first-and-10 on B15. Although Team A's foul is disregarded as part of the 5-15 penalty enforcement, both teams committed a foul that prevented a snap, so neither team can challenge the previous play.
texts.text: Ruling: The ruling of incomplete pass is not reviewable. A's ball, first-and-10 on B15. Although Team A's foul is disregarded as part of the 5-15 penalty enforcement, both teams committed a foul that prevented a snap, so neither team can challenge the previous play.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: PENALTY ENFORCEMENT AFTER REVERSAL
texts.text: PENALTY ENFORCEMENT AFTER REVERSAL

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.266 UNR/UNS enforcement
texts.text: A.R. 15.266 UNR/UNS enforcement

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on A30. QBA1 throws a low pass that is ruled intercepted by B2 at the A43-yard line. B2 returns the ball to the A10yard line where he is tackled by the facemask by A3. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before B2 intercepted it.
texts.text: First-and-10 on A30. QBA1 throws a low pass that is ruled intercepted by B2 at the A43-yard line. B2 returns the ball to the A10yard line where he is tackled by the facemask by A3. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before B2 intercepted it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball second-and-25 on A15, reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Pass is incomplete but the facemask penalty must be enforced. This applies to any UNR or UNS foul, and it is enforced as a dead ball penalty. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball second-and-25 on A15, reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Pass is incomplete but the facemask penalty must be enforced. This applies to any UNR or UNS foul, and it is enforced as a dead ball penalty. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.267 UNR/UNS enforcement with a double foul
texts.text: A.R. 15.267 UNR/UNS enforcement with a double foul

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on A30. QBA1 throws a low pass that is ruled intercepted by B2 at the A43-yard line. B2 returns the ball to the A10yard line. During the return, B4 blocked A5 low at the A23-yard line. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before B2 intercepted it. Team A was in an illegal formation at the snap.
texts.text: First-and-10 on A30. QBA1 throws a low pass that is ruled intercepted by B2 at the A43-yard line. B2 returns the ball to the A10yard line. During the return, B4 blocked A5 low at the A23-yard line. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before B2 intercepted it. Team A was in an illegal formation at the snap.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball, first-and-10 on A45. Pass is incomplete, reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground and the low block must be enforced. It combines with the live ball illegal formation to create a 5-15 enforcement. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball, first-and-10 on A45. Pass is incomplete, reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground and the low block must be enforced. It combines with the live ball illegal formation to create a 5-15 enforcement. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.268 Penalty not enforced after reversal
texts.text: A.R. 15.268 Penalty not enforced after reversal

texts.label: text
texts.orig: First-and-10 on A30. QBA1 throws a low pass that is ruled intercepted by B2 at the A43-yard line. B2 returns the ball to the A10yard line and during his return B5 is called for an illegal block above the waist. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before B2 intercepted it.
texts.text: First-and-10 on A30. QBA1 throws a low pass that is ruled intercepted by B2 at the A43-yard line. B2 returns the ball to the A10yard line and during his return B5 is called for an illegal block above the waist. Replays show that the ball hit the ground before B2 intercepted it.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball second-and-10 on A30, reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Only UNR/UNS fouls are enforced in this situation. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play.
texts.text: Ruling: Reviewable. A's ball second-and-10 on A30, reset the clock to the time when the ball hit the ground. Only UNR/UNS fouls are enforced in this situation. Only the Replay Official can initiate a review of this play.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: REPLAY SYSTEM
texts.text: REPLAY SYSTEM

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: A.R. 15.269 Loss of communication
texts.text: A.R. 15.269 Loss of communication

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Second-and-10 on B30 with one minute remaining in the second quarter. QBA1 throws a pass to A3 at the B15 near the sideline and the pass is ruled incomplete. Replays show that the receiver had two feet in bounds with possession of the ball. The Replay Official initiates a review and as the Referee is coming over to the monitor, officials at the stadium lose communications with the League office.
texts.text: Second-and-10 on B30 with one minute remaining in the second quarter. QBA1 throws a pass to A3 at the B15 near the sideline and the pass is ruled incomplete. Replays show that the receiver had two feet in bounds with possession of the ball. The Replay Official initiates a review and as the Referee is coming over to the monitor, officials at the stadium lose communications with the League office.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ruling: A's ball first-and-10 on B15. The Referee is to stay at the monitor for one minute while communications are being repaired. If  communications  are  not  restored  in  one  minute,  then  the  Referee  will  conduct  the  review  with  the  Replay  Official.  If communications are repaired within the one-minute time frame, then the League office will review the play as customary.
texts.text: Ruling: A's ball first-and-10 on B15. The Referee is to stay at the monitor for one minute while communications are being repaired. If  communications  are  not  restored  in  one  minute,  then  the  Referee  will  conduct  the  review  with  the  Replay  Official.  If communications are repaired within the one-minute time frame, then the League office will review the play as customary.
